Solution Accuracy.description: The degree to which the final answer is correct and matches the expected outcome.

Reasoning Clarity.description: The clarity and traceability of the logical steps taken by the agents to arrive at the solution.

Efficiency.description: How quickly and with how few steps the agents were able to solve the problem, considering the complexity of the task.

Innovation.description: The level of creativity and originality in the problem-solving approach.

Robustness.description: The ability of the system to handle different types and variations of questions within the given scope.

Linguistic Competence.description: The ability to use and understand the language correctly in the context of the problem.

Agent Cooperation.description: The effectiveness of the agents working together to solve the task.
